creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text:
The constructor's signature is inconsistent with the javadoc. The implementation's signature is 

TagAttributeInfo(String, boolean, String, boolean)

The javadoc specifies it as 

TagAttributeInfo(String, boolean, boolean, String)

Which one is correct?
The JavaDoc looks OK to me.
creator: marc.saegesser@apropos.com
